issue.title: R Tutorials 2021-Q4 Initiative
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14277](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14277). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
An umbrella ticket for the initiative of writing up a set of Tutorials for R users

comments.body:
